Starice/Condor/Khonkolor/Wizard/Noble::

"Alpha is guarding the ship... Still some Maximals aren't leaveing to 
pods and we're ready to face anything" answered Wizard.


The others Maximals nodded.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Richard Allen" <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::Epyon::
> 
> He saw his men come to his side.
> "Wizard, report. Status of the ship, the pods, and you all."
